languages.text: "Допустим. Не могу сказать, что полностью убежден в вашей искренности, но слова для начала беседы вы выбрали неплохо".
"Let us suppose that it is so. I cannot say that I am completely convinced of your sincerity, but you are off to a good start with your choice of words."
languages.original_text: "Допустим. Не могу сказать, что полностью убежден в вашей искренности, но слова для начала беседы вы выбрали неплохо".

traits.locale_text: "Let us assume it is so. I cannot say that I am completely convinced of your sincerity, but you are off to a good start with your choice of words."
"Let us assume it is so. I cannot say that I am completely convinced of your sincerity, but you are off to a good start with your choice of words."
"If you say so. I cannot say that I'm completely convinced of your sincerity, but you are off to a good start with your choice of words."
"If you say so. I cannot say that I'm completely convinced of your sincerity, but you are off to a good start with your choice of words."
"Let us suppose that it is so. I cannot say that I am completely convinced of your sincerity, but you are off to a good start with your choice of words."
"Let us suppose that it is so. I cannot say that I am completely convinced of your sincerity, but you are off to a good start with your choice of words."

languages.text: « Quand bien même ce serait le cas, je ne suis pas franchement convaincu de votre sincérité, mais vous avez bien choisi votre entrée en matière. »
languages.original_text: "Let us suppose that it is so. I cannot say that I am completely convinced of your sincerity, but you are off to a good start with your choice of words."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous le dites. Je ne suis pas franchement convaincu de votre sincérité, mais vous avez bien choisi votre entrée en matière. »

languages.text: «Supongamos que sea así. No puedo decir que me haya convencido por completo, pero por lo menos elige bien sus palabras».
languages.original_text: "Let us suppose that it is so. I cannot say that I am completely convinced of your sincerity, but you are off to a good start with your choice of words."

traits.locale_text: «Si usted lo dice. Aún no estoy convencido de la veracidad de sus palabras, pero al menos ha sido un buen comienzo».

languages.text: “我们来假设如此吧。我不能说我完全相信你的诚意，但你的措辞已经为这场谈话开了个好头。”
languages.original_text: "Let us suppose that it is so. I cannot say that I am completely convinced of your sincerity, but you are off to a good start with your choice of words."

traits.locale_text: “既然你这么说的话，我不能说我完全相信你的诚意，但你的措辞已经为这场谈话开了个好头。”

languages.text: "Gehen wir einmal davon aus. Ich kann nicht behaupten, von Eurer Aufrichtigkeit vollständig überzeugt zu sein, doch Eure Wortwahl ist ein guter Anfang."
languages.original_text: "Let us suppose that it is so. I cannot say that I am completely convinced of your sincerity, but you are off to a good start with your choice of words."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr das sagt. Ich kann nicht behaupten, von Eurer Aufrichtigkeit vollständig überzeugt zu sein, doch Eure Wortwahl ist ein guter Anfang."

languages.text: 「仮にそうだとしよう。あなたの誠実さを完全に納得したというわけではないが、その言葉は、まだ幸先の良いものであったと言えるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Let us suppose that it is so. I cannot say that I am completely convinced of your sincerity, but you are off to a good start with your choice of words."

traits.locale_text: 「仮にそうだとしよう。あなたの誠実さを完全に納得したというわけではないが、その言葉は、まだ幸先の良いものであったと言えるだろう」

languages.text: "Öyle oldu diyelim. İçtenliğine henüz tam olarak güvenmiyorum ama kelimelerini iyi seçerek güzel bir başlangıç yaptın."
languages.original_text: "Let us suppose that it is so. I cannot say that I am completely convinced of your sincerity, but you are off to a good start with your choice of words."
